file.name: tf2_ip_API仕様書.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: TF2 API(integration provider)
  description: TF2 QAI-Testbed integration provider 
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: 'https://127.0.0.1:6000/qai-ip/api/0.0.1'
    description: IP server

paths:
  '/{organizer_id}/mlComponents/{ml_components_id}/job':
    post:
      tags:
        - Job
      summary: ジョブの新規作成・実行.
      description: ジョブの新規作成・実行.
      parameters:
        - name: organizer_id
          in: path
          description: 組織ID
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: ml_components_id
          in: path
          description: 機械学習コンポーネントId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ジョブ実行の成否とjob_id
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                required:
                  - Result
                  - JobId
                properties:
                  Result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      Code:
                        type: string
                      Massage:
                        type: string
                  JobId:
                    type: integer
                example:
                  Result:
                    Code: 'R12000'
                    Message: 'job create success.'
                  JobId: 1

  '/health-check':
    get:
      tags:
        - _maintenance
      summary: 疎通確認
      description: 疎通確認
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 疎通確認
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                required:
                  - Code
                  - Massage
                properties:
                  Code:
                    type: integer
                  Massage:
                    type: string
                example:
                  "Code": 0
                  "Message": "alive."

  '/{organizer_id}/mlComponents/{ml_components_id}/jobs/{job_id}/runs/{run_id}/notify-complete':
    post:
      tags:
        - Job
      summary: ジョブの実行状況の確認.
      description: すでに実行されたジョブの状況を確認し、更新されている場合、DBをアップデートさせる.
      parameters:
        - name: organizer_id
          in: path
          description: 組織ID
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: ml_components_id
          in: path
          description: 機械学習コンポーネントId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: job_id
          in: path
          description: フロントエンドで実行ボタンを押した単位をjobと呼ぶ。
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: run_id
          in: path
          description: Jobに内包するTDの各々の実行をrunと呼ぶ。
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: APIのステータス
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                required:
                  - Result
                properties:
                  Result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      Code:
                        type: string
                      Massage:
                        type: string
                example:
                  Result:
                    Code: 'R40000'
                    Message: 'notify success.'
        '404':
          description: APIのステータス
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                required:
                  - Result
                properties:
                  Result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      Code:
                        type: string
                      Massage:
                        type: string
                example:
                  Result:
                    Code: 'R49020'
                    Message: 'not found summary_file.'

components:
  schemas:
    Result:
      type: object
